Name: Color X Memory
About the game: Minimalistic puzzle game to test your visual memory. There are hidden colored cards on the field. Your task is to find all paired cards by color. The game ends as soon as all the cards on the field are open. To get the best result, you need to make as few mistakes as possible when opening paired cards. Good luck with your game.
